meanings.definition: Something given freely or distributed to a group
meanings.sent1: The teacher gave us a handout with all the answers on it.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to receiving a handout at the end of the seminar.
meanings.sent3: The handout was like a surprise gift from the presenter.
meanings.sent4: The handout was a lifesaver during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The colorful handout made the information easy to remember.

meanings.definition: A piece of paper containing information or instructions
meanings.sent1: I lost the handout with the map to the treasure.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to read the handout before starting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The handout looked like a secret message waiting to be decoded.
meanings.sent4: The handout was a roadmap to success.
meanings.sent5: The handout had all the answers neatly printed on it.

meanings.definition: To distribute or give out freely
meanings.sent1: The volunteers will handout flyers at the event.
meanings.sent2: Please handout the brochures to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: I will handout compliments like confetti at the party.
meanings.sent4: She handout smiles wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The company decided to handout free samples to attract customers.
